website_summaries.verdict: This is a contemporary scent that has a refreshing citrus fragrance; it's soft and not overpowering.
pros: Customers love that this scent is subtle and classic, easy to use as your everyday go-to perfume
It gets top marks for being long-lasting and is an excellent perfume for summer thanks to its light citrus notes
cons: Some feel the floral notes are too strong

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume I wish it wasn’t that expensive for a small bottle. I always get asked at work what I use . I recommend people to buy this if they like a sweet mono tone smell
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Longevity is poor!
customer_reviews.text: First time I bought this perfume was Duty Free at the airport and since then I loved it. However, my first experience with buying it on Amazon did't meet my expectation,especially the longevity. Earlier on, the scent would last the whole day, but this time, only a matter of hours. Not exactly sure what the issue is - perhaps it wasn't original? I can't tell.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Perfumes smell different in the bottle. Spray yourself first.
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite perfume! It smells good all day! It's a nice fresh smell. If you know someone who has it, spray it on you before you decide whether or not you like it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen LeeLee

customer_reviews.title: Burberry Weekend
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent and the look of the bottle. However, I was disappointed that the longevity of the fragrance doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: barbara thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: It smells like pure alcohol smells fake I was VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lisa brock

customer_reviews.title: Niece's favorite. Geat price and no need to hunt through ...
customer_reviews.text: Niece's favorite. Geat price and no need to hunt through department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Came leaking, almost no perfume left! Need a replacement!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! It came leaking, the package was spoiled, I didn't expect this kind of quality of product for $66. I'm asking for replacement! (See the images attached)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Scent. Ever. I love it. Burberry is good stuff but I have to be in the mood for most of their perfumes. This one though is sweet, citrusy and very clean smelling. And it lasts! I could still smell it on me the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Maley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! this fragrance. My mom wears it all the time and I can't stop smelling her. This is a type of fragrance that people have stopped and asked "What are you wearing"? Top fragrance of all time.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite scents - its name is perfect - Weekend. Pair of jeans, sweater, this perfume - perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my lady friend at her request. She likes some other Burberry fragrance but hadn't tried Weekend before. She claims to like it but I don't believe that. To me, it smells like the potpourri spray people often keep in their bathrooms. I would use it for that, but after I sprayed it, my boss asked me if I had hugged an old woman recently.
customer_reviews.author: James O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent perfume
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it as a gift for my mother and it arrived 4 days early. Cant complain about anything and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and my special someone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: A little misleading....had I know it would be such a small bottle, I would have never purchased.
customer_reviews.author: hamptord

customer_reviews.title: What is the actual ounce(s)?
customer_reviews.text: Product introduction photo shows 3.3oz and the description does not clarify a 1 ounce bottle as the actual item received.
customer_reviews.author: PBU23

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, Happy life.
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. Now to buy the 3 oz bottle and the Burberry Londonto keep a smile on her face
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Vanderpool

customer_reviews.title: How long the sent last
customer_reviews.text: I love the sent of Burberry “The Weekend for women, I’ve been using it for years now and every time I’m in public someone ask me “What’s the name if your perfume?” And I tell them Burberry “ The Weekend”
customer_reviews.author: bettie M Lamar dukes

customer_reviews.title: Weak sent that does last!!!!🛍
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite perfume of all time! I don’t know if there’s a different formula but the smell is so weak and it doesn’t last! The glass bottle is also different from the original product! If you like Burberry perfume don’t buy this one you’ll be as disappointed as I’am!!!!😩
customer_reviews.author: BigT

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely misleading. This is not worth the price. The bottle is ridiculously small for $95. I am accustom buying the size I received for approximately $50 however this one is $95. Complete rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Khadija

customer_reviews.title: One of our favourite perfumes!
customer_reviews.text: It is a favourite perfume in our family, nothing more needs to be said. It hits all the right notes and is used by two generations in our family :-)
customer_reviews.author: blackwhite

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: The small bottle only lasted a month, but “The Weekend” is a nice fresh scent. I would suggest to go for a larger size if making the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monet

customer_reviews.title: Soft and sweet
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and slightly sweet smelling. It's really nice. It makes me think of soft blankets and warm sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Green

customer_reviews.title: Waisted Money
customer_reviews.text: The perfume has so much water in it, the scent doesn't last more than 30 minutes. Very, disappointed for 52.00 I was expecting better.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty-Angie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent!!!! Perfect delicateness. I don’t usually wear it but bought it because of Cvs good reviews. I highly recommend. One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ring

customer_reviews.title: Every Nose Is Different I Guess!
customer_reviews.text: Xmas Gift for wife. She was thrilled (Loves Burberry everything)... however, she thought it was too strong for her. Luckily her mom said she was crazy & loved the fragrance so it won't go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great scent that lasts... just getting too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This one is my favorite.... but they keep raising the price so I don’t ifIll keep ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lewis-Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: TOO much money!
customer_reviews.text: TOo much money for such a small bottle!! Wanted to return it, but not giving me this option!!!
customer_reviews.author: gold

customer_reviews.title: little bottle for expensive price
customer_reviews.text: didnt like that i was duked into buying a liltle bottle
customer_reviews.author: darrick. farquharson.  sr

customer_reviews.title: Many compliments on this fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this fragrance. I wear it to work and date night.
customer_reviews.author: T Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I always look to Amazon for the best price not with fragrances
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought it for my daughters birthday. It arrived in a timely manner. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy cupid

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and is not over-powering
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and is not over-powering. I suffer from a lot of headaches and have to be careful with certain fragrances. This is mild and gentle, yet you can still smell it throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Soft fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite of the Burberry, it is soft and it's the only one that doesn't give me a headache. It's soft enough to wear in the morning, not overpowering
customer_reviews.author: Yuls Oh

customer_reviews.title: Always loved this smell
customer_reviews.text: Always loved this smell. I originally bought when I was in on a cruise. Glad when I found the price was much cheaper on Amazon. Would highly recommend for someone who love to fill classy .
customer_reviews.author: mary allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: thank you to provide girls this perfume! couldn't find it before
customer_reviews.author: Diana Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, the fragrance is very good and original.
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO HACHUL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This perfume is SUPER SEXY! I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey n. rivera

customer_reviews.title: I'm always ready for the weekend with this.
customer_reviews.text: One of my most favorite perfumes. I received this as a gift and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Soheili

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was ripped off. This bottle is only 1oz. I paid $42 dollars for 1oz!. Looking around, this perfume sells for $39 for 3.3oz at walgreens!!! Not happy at all with this purchase. Total fraud. WAY OVERPRICED.
customer_reviews.author: Jasonk

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to write a review for something so subject to personal tastes. I will start by saying that the bottle is unique and has a sprayer. Not particularly beautiful, but not bad. The scent, however, for me started out "OK" and as the day wore on it got more and more cloying until I couldn't wait to wash it off. I'm not a perfume expert, so I don't know the proper terms, but it's way too sweet-smelling to me. I was expecting something more light and citrus-y but it's sweet and obtrusive. I suspect office mates would not appreciate it. You, on the other hand, may love it, though. You really can't tell without sniffing a sample.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi D

customer_reviews.title: Got some compliments while wearing it
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to give an objective review of a perfume; every person has different likes and dislikes when it comes to fragrances. What I can say is this is a delicate, not overpowering fragrance with citrus and floral notes. My wife was asked on two seperate occasions what she was wearing and that the frangrance was very nice. She normally likes Gabriela Sabatini but finds this one to be good for more than just casual wear and liked by almost everyone who notices it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Light, a little sweet, a little floral
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a signature scent, so I'm not loyal to this or that perfume. This scent is light, a little floral, a little sweet, but not cloying, dense or overwhelming. It won't knock you out, but you will notice it. It doesn't have any hint of muskiness. I suppose the name is intended to signify casual, and it does achieve that. You could wear it for any occasion, but it doesn't feel like a special occasion scent.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Burberry Weekend Perfume
customer_reviews.text: This is a pleasant scent. It only takes one spray, so be careful. The scent is soft, not harsh. It stays on my skin all day, but does not take over a room as some scents do. I have allergies but this perfume did not trigger them, after using it I didn't get any tightness in my chest. It has been thirty years since I wore perfume, and now I found one I am able to use! I wish it wasn't a spray though.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite. I smelled this when my daughters friend brought it over I fell in love with it, however, I wasn't paying $80 for a bottle of perfume (though I was very tempted) I just got my bottle, ok I got 2. This stuff makes me relax. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephlloyd76

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD ONE
customer_reviews.text: Another fine perfume by Burberry, my wife says it smells "seductive" and I find it refreshing, clear, and complex and rewarding in the scents that drift up from it in layers --fruitiness, sandalwood, etc. Another plus is that it lingers on the skin for a long time. This is a decided winner. I received this sample for free in exchange of my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: David Keymer

customer_reviews.title: Unique bottle, soft scent; very nice
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was visual: the bottle is interesting and beautiful - and it will never tip over on your dresser! I seldom use scent of any kind because it can be overpowering to me, so I applied this very sparingly. I liked the soft floral scents (peach & hyacinth?) with just a note of something tangy. I could catch the scent all day long, but I am sensitive to odors so the scent may not last as long for others.
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing I got it at Ross store for only 24.00!!
customer_reviews.author: serolfasor

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Evening perfume
customer_reviews.text: Though its name is weekend, I wear it on evening outings. It is more of a "formal", "grown up" scent. It fixes well on my skin (scent lasts). Sophisticated, love it. I've had it for a long time, and still have most of it left.
customer_reviews.author: MrsC

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Like this parfume, but it is really expansive on Amazon, just bought today the same bottle for 30$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light & Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I gave Burberry to my sister for her birthday, and she loves it! She prefers a lighter, slightly citrus scent, and says this is now one of her favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it works with my wife's body chemistry. Very light & refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Shankar Narayanan

customer_reviews.title: Amazon needs to sell the tester
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to sell the tester!!! Around $32. Can't purchase this for $80. It's is the only purfume I wear and it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked the smell of this perfume a lot. I like it as well. It is fresh but subdued enough that it isn't obstrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Matthieu Hausig

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely! Perfect! I have been wearing this fragrance for years and I still take a breath and smile every time I use it. I can't find it here any more so I have turned to Amazon. It is not an overbearing fragrance so for those of you like me, who have to be very careful what we smell or put on our skin, this is one to try.
customer_reviews.author: Geneve

customer_reviews.title: Coming from a perfume addict- I like this! It's an upbeat scent
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a perfume addict- I like this! It's an upbeat scent! It makes me feel wild and ready for my day! The scent only lasts about three hours, but for those three hours, you can definitely smell it! I randomly chose this scent, but am happy I did. Would recommend. It smells outdoorsy, bright, and solid!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cologne this week and its smells good! I only buy the best smelling colognes and this is one of them. I own alot. Don't think just buy.
customer_reviews.author: Danny G

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful scent. its crisp but light smelling not over baring. Men love the smell of this perfume. Its a huge seller. You can barely find it anymore. Even women love the smell of this perfume.
customer_reviews.author: moemore

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this perfume will buy this again 😍😘
customer_reviews.author: Sweetbaby

customer_reviews.title: Just Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I had previously tested this in my local chemist and hadnt really liked it. But my boyfriend bought me it for Christmas and now I have absoloutely adore it. But since it's in such a small bottle save it for special occasions. I would reccomend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION ALL WEEK LONG!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for day or night, its casual and inviting fir lunch with the girls, sexy but not overbearing on date night. I lobe this scernt, discpvered it a few years ago, and while ill switch it up every now and then, I ALWAYS have this one.
customer_reviews.author: Renee t polverari

product_meta.title: Burberry Weekend Eau De Parfum for Women, 1.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Burberry Weekend Eau De Parfum Spray 1.7 Oz/ 50 Ml for Women by Burberry

BRAND STORY
Founded in 1856, Burberry is led by principles of design, innovation and expert craftsmanship. Our signature fragrances are presented in crafted glass bottles, with scents inspired by music and fashion, London and British icons.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
